title: Can I Get Unban Please?
body: Long story short. Got permanently banned. Story goes: was toxic, got 2 week banned (skipped chat restriction somehow). After 2 week ban, play ONE game, gets permanent ban. Yo, I know I'm toxic but no way I'm toxic enough to deserve permanent ban. I didn't even know you can get permanent banned for being toxic. I thought you have to be extra like intentionally feeding, cheat, afking to even get permanent ban. i'm just saying if I known I would be punished this hard I would not have been toxic that game. This situation escalated way too quickly, 2 week ban before chat restriction, then permanent ban after ONE game? Can I unban please? No lie 100% never toxic again if I get unban. @Riot

replies.body:
Unfortunately *any* amount of consistent toxicity can merit a permanent ban. Riot's stance is that toxicity merits a permanent ban, and *excessive* toxicity earns a *faster* permanent ban. It's a common misconception that permanent bans are only for the worst of the worst -- they're something that any toxic player can earn if they don't reform their behavior, because Riot considers repeated toxicity of any time unacceptable.

You are also warned on your 14-day ban that further violations can result in a permanent ban.

----------------------------

All that aside, bans are not lifted unless they are in error so, I am sorry to say, the account is lost.

...I have no context for this. This is a 9-month old thread, and we discourage thread necromancy, especially without context. I will be locking this thread, but if you have a **Player Behavior**-related concern I encourage you to make a new post about your specific situation.

'No lie 100% never toxic again if I get unban'  -  the greatest lie in  the history of  league of legends.

'I know I'm toxic but no way I'm toxic enough to deserve permanent ban'  -  every deplorable toxic player says this.
Believe me, the first part is very wrong in your comment. You don’t know how many memories some accounts hold, nothing is too dear to stop to get an account back.

>  I didn't even know you can get permanent banned for being toxic.

Well then maybe you shouldn't have ignored that 14 day ban. You should have learned from it that your behaviour is unacceptable, and you should have actually read it. It states on the 14 day ban that the next punishment will be a permanent ban.

---

Permanent bans are never reverted, unless they were given out by mistake. From your story this it seems that the ban was given out intentionally, and as such you can not get it back, sorry :/

You are free to make another account though.
You have a chance man i was banned for excessive toxicity - it was bad- 5 months later i appealed and got it reduced to a secondc14 day ban
